title: Spark Energy Grapefruit & Peppermint Glade® Aromatherapy Cool Mist Diffuser Refill
description: Melt into a dual blend of essential oil-infused fragrance and enjoy the Spark Energy scent. Own the air with the blend of North American Grapefruit and American Peppermint, the Glade® Spark Energy Aromatherapy Cool Mist Diffuser Refill works with our Glade Aromatherapy Mist Diffuser to emit this dual-blend fragrance throughout your space for up to 60 days*. Simply treat your senses with one-click diffuser refills that are preblended & easily inserted into our Mist Diffuser device. *on low setting
